q_en: How many sewing tasks did Skilled Sewers complete before June 2024, and what types of products were produced for these sewing tasks?

steps.sql: SELECT id FROM working_group WHERE name = 'Skilled Sewers';
steps.description: Retrieve the working group ID for the working group with the name "Skilled Sewers"

steps.sql: SELECT id, order_product_id FROM sewing_tasks WHERE working_group_id = '7' AND status = 2 AND end_time < '2024-06-01';
steps.description: Retrieve the completed sewing tasks before June 2024 for the working group "Skilled Sewers"

steps.sql: SELECT DISTINCT pt.description FROM order_product op JOIN products p ON op.product_id = p.id JOIN products_types pt ON p.products_type_id = pt.id WHERE op.id IN (17, 18);
steps.description: Retrieve the product types for the completed sewing tasks

response:

|----------------------------|-------------------|

The "Skilled Sewers" completed a total of 2 sewing tasks, and the product type produced for these tasks was a Jacket. If you have any more questions or need further assistance, feel free to ask! ğŸ§µğŸ‘—
